dcterms:creator: S. Basu
M. Gupta
P. Gupta
C. Arora
dcterms:description: The GBC US dataset consists of 1255 image samples from 218 patients, including 990 non-malignant and 265 malignant gallbladder images. The dataset contains image labels as well as bounding box annotations showing the malignant regions, although only image labels are used for training.
dcterms:title: GBC US dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Jha

dcterms:description: The Kvasir-SEG dataset consists of 1000 white light colonoscopy images showing polyps. It is used for polyp detection and segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Kvasir-SEG

dcterms:creator: S. Ali
D. Jha
N. Ghatwary
S. Realdon
R. Cannizzaro
O. E. Salem
D. Lamarque
C. Daul
M. A. Riegler
K. V. Anonsen
dcterms:description: PolypGen is a multi-centre dataset for polyp detection and segmentation, aimed at assessing generalisability in medical imaging tasks.
dcterms:title: PolypGen
